name: cis
displayName: SAP Cloud Management service for SAP BTP

servicePlans.name: account-context
servicePlans.description: Service plan for retrieving account contextual information for SAP BTP entities.

servicePlans.name: central
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using Cloud Management service APIs to manage your global accounts, subaccounts, directories, and entitlements.

servicePlans.name: central-viewer
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using Cloud Management APIs to read your global accounts, subaccounts, directories, and entitlements.

servicePlans.name: cloud-automation
servicePlans.description: Allows users to create and manage Cloud Automation resources in a global account.

servicePlans.name: cloud-automation-requests-agent
servicePlans.description: Allows users to create and manage Cloud Automation requests in a global account.

servicePlans.name: commercial-access
servicePlans.description: Service plan for content providers to manage their product lifecycle including entitlements, platform and commercial registration, and more.

servicePlans.name: directory-initial-authorizations
servicePlans.description: Service plan for managing and provisioning the default authorizations for directories.

servicePlans.name: entity-metadata-settings
servicePlans.displayName: Cloud Management Service - Entity Metadata Settings
servicePlans.description: Allows to create and extend entity metadata settings and to maintain their values.

servicePlans.name: global-account-initial-authorizations
servicePlans.description: Service plan for managing and provisioning the default authorizations for global accounts.

servicePlans.name: local
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using Cloud Management service APIs to manage your environments and subscriptions to multitenant applications.

servicePlans.name: local-viewer
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using Cloud Management APIs to read your environments and subscriptions to multitenant applications.

servicePlans.name: subaccount-initial-authorizations
servicePlans.description: Service plan for managing and provisioning the default authorizations for subaccounts.

servicePlans.name: subscription-viewer
servicePlans.description: Service plan for getting subscriptions information.

servicePlans.name: system-basic
servicePlans.description: Service plan for getting entitlement assignments, and commercial-related events to facilitate account and entitlement management.

servicePlans.name: system-basic-central
servicePlans.description: Service plan for getting entitlement assignments to facilitate quota management for subaccounts in all regions.

servicePlans.name: system-central
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using Cloud Management APIs with cross-tenant credentials to manage global accounts, subaccounts, directories, and entitlements.

servicePlans.name: system-full
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using CIS APIs

servicePlans.name: system-local
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using Cloud Management APIs with cross-tenant credentials to manage environments and subscriptions to multitenant applications.

servicePlans.name: system-viewer
servicePlans.description: Service plan for using CIS APIs (read-only operations)

servicePlans.name: system-viewer-subaccount
servicePlans.description: Service plan for getting information about a specified subaccount (intended for service owners)

servicePlans.name: system-xpr
servicePlans.description: Service plan for creating and managing resource providers to allow a global account to connect to a provider account on a non-SAP cloud vendor.

servicePlans.name: trial-initial-authorizations
servicePlans.description: Service plan for managing and provisioning the default authorizations for trial accounts.

servicePlans.name: xrs
servicePlans.description: A service which manages access to a single cross-platform registration center for services, multitenant applications, and environments.
